frontmatter.title: Being asked to log in when trying to start a stream
frontmatter.metaTitle: Being asked to log in when trying to start a stream
frontmatter.metaDesc: What to do if you see a login page when trying to start a stream from Shopify

pageProps.content:
If you are seeing the login page below when trying to [start a new stream from Shopify Admin](/support/get-started-in-shopify/), this means that your Shopify account was disconnected from the Reactive app. This can happen when clicking the *Disconnect* button on the Reactive Live Shopping app page in Shopify admin.

To get reconnected please reach out to [support@reactive.live](mailto:support@reactive.live) and a representative will get you reconnected ASAP.

![Reactive login page](/blog-assets/support-assets/seeing-login-page/login.png)
